title: Red Steel 2 (Wii) Playthrough ‚Äî Part 3
description: Every time I play this game I have more fun with it. As you get more and more abilities the game gets more fun, you feel more powerful but there's still some difficult parts so it balances out well. Honestly one of the better Wii games I've ever played.

@Nulak it happened to me only once, it was last month, my pc went out alone and it "rebooted" alone, I thought it was a problem of a component that I swore was the processor and from there, with a great cleaning of components and replenishing the thermal paste again, nothing happened until it happened again and when I took it to the technical service, it was revealed that it was the PSU, it was failing because of the fan problem, rightly it was overheating
